Producer: Gerard Butler, Nicolas Chartier, Craig J. Flores, Patrick Newall, Mark Williams
Synopsis: Dane Jensen is a hard-driven headhunter who works at a cutthroat firm. When his boss pits him against the equally driven Lynn Vogel, Dane gears up for the professional battle of his life. When his young son is then given a harrowing diagnosis, Dane is suddenly pulled between achieving his professional dream and spending time with the family that needs him now more than ever.
Title: The Headhunter's Calling
